divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a normal day nothing unusual I was eating dinner with my friends Matthew and Ryan we were getting up to wash are plates when we heard a wierd humming noise coming from my window I opened it very slowly thats when me and my friends saw a HUGE! bullet thing It was like a blimp but sharper looking in the what looked like the front.Me and my friends went outside to see what was it when a small red light flickred then we noticed the flying object was silent and then a even smaller light flickred we started to back up when beam of light blue flew towrds us we were quickly teleported into a light room so light we could barley open are eyes then we saw figures coming towrds us then we felt pains on are feet we were screeming very loud then the strange figures just went away Matthew got up and looked at his feet the light turned off and we were back on the floor of are house parking lot we checked are feet when we were done Ryan looked at the sky and saw the object he threw a rock at it then the rock blew up and the ufo floated away.
trends: There have been 56 other sightings in Detroit
There were no other sightings in Detroit on or around February 16th 2007
